heroDescription: Orange, California, is a vibrant city known for its rich history and diverse economy.
landscapeDescription: With a population of 139,969, Orange boasts a dynamic economy supported by retail, healthcare, and education sectors. The city's strategic location enhances its appeal for businesses and residents alike.

sections.title: Economic Growth
sections.description: According to BEA (2023), Orange's economy has seen a steady growth rate of 3.5% over the past year, driven by retail and healthcare expansions.

sections.title: Wealth Demographics

sections.title: Cost of Living

sections.title: Business Environment
